info.text: If you have forgotten your password, follow the instruction below for account recovery. You will need to re-verify your e-mail and authenticator. You will not lose the data you have created in :Tyle

email.email: Please ensure that the e-mail is formatted correctly

code.matches: Please ensure that there are only digits in your code

details.title: Register
details.description: Create an account to collaborate with your organization!
details.error: We were not able to create your user at this moment. Please try again in about a minute. If the problem persists,

info.text: Your next step will be to verify your e-mail and activate 2-factor authentication. Without these, you cannot access :Tyle. If this process is interrupted or you do not complete registration within 1 hour, you will have to start the registration process over again.

placeholders.purpose: Please explain why should have access to the application.

email.email: Please ensure that the e-mail is formatted correctly

password.min: The password must be at least 10 characters long

confirmPassword.match: The password does not match the one previously entered
confirmPassword.required: Please re-enter the password you have chosen

purpose.required: Please explain your purpose for creating this account

verify.title: Verify e-mail
verify.error: We were not able verify your ownership of this email. Verify that that you have entered the correct code and please try again in about a minute. If the issue persist,

info.text: We have sent a six-digit code to your e-mail. Please enter the code within 1 hour, or the code will expire and you will have to restart the registration. Make sure to check your spam/junk folder for the e-mail.

manual.title: Can't scan image?
manual.description: Copy this code into your authenticator app of choice

info.text: In order to use :Tyle, you must activate 2-factor authentication using an authenticator app. This is to ensure the quality fo the data created and stored in :Tyle.
Account creation complete. Please return to the main page and log in.

details.title: Account recovery
details.error: We were not able to start the recovery process. Please try again in about a minute. If the issue persists,

info.text: Your next step will be to verify your e-mail and activate 2-factor authentication. Without these, you cannot access :Tyle. If this process is interrupted or you do not complete registration within 1 hour, you will have to start the recovery process over again.

email.email: Please ensure that the email is formatted correctly

verify.title: Verify e-mail
verify.error: We were not able verify your ownership of this email. Verify that that you have entered the correct code and please try again in about a minute. If the issue persist,

info.text: We have sent a six-digit code to your email. Please enter the code within 1 hour, or the code will expire and you will have to restart the recovery process. Make sure to check your spam/junk folder for the email.

password.title: Choose a new password
password.error: We were not able to change your password at this time. Please try again in about a minute. If the issue persist,

info.text: Enter the desired password for this account.

password.min: The password must be at least 10 characters long

confirmPassword.match: The password does not match the one previously entered
confirmPassword.required: Please re-enter the password you have chosen

manual.title: Can't scan image?
manual.description: Copy this code into your authenticator app of choice

info.text: In order to use :Tyle, you must activate 2-factor authentication using an authenticator app. This is to ensure the quality fo the data created and stored in :Tyle.
Account recovery complete. Please return to the main page and log in.
